00029 const char* DICT_ARCHIVE_FILE = "sys.bin";
00030 
00032 const char* USER_DICT_PREFIX = "userdic_";
00033 
00034 const unsigned int JMA_DICT_VERSION = 100;
00035 const unsigned int JMA_DICT_BLOCK_SIZE = 512;
00036 const unsigned int JMA_DICT_BLOCK_MASK = JMA_DICT_BLOCK_SIZE - 1;
00037 const unsigned int JMA_DICT_FILE_NAME_SIZE = 500;
00038 
00044 inline unsigned int roundBlockSize(unsigned int value)
00045 {
00046     return (value + JMA_DICT_BLOCK_MASK) & ~JMA_DICT_BLOCK_MASK;
00047 }
00048 
00055 inline string createFileName(const char* prefix, unsigned int index)
00056 {
00057     ostringstream ost;
00058     ost << prefix << index;
00059     return ost.str();
00060 }
00061 
00065 class Buffer
00066 {
00067 public:
00072     Buffer(unsigned int s)
00073         : size_(s) {
00074         buffer_ = new char[size_];
00075         reset();
00076     }
00077 
00081     ~Buffer() {
00082         delete[] buffer_;
00083     }
00084 
00089     const char* get() const {
00090         return buffer_;
00091     }
00092 
00097     unsigned int size() const {
00098         return size_;
00099     }
00100 
00105     unsigned int pos() const {
00106         return pos_;
00107     }
00108 
00113     void advance(unsigned int len) {
00114         pos_ += len;
00115     }
00116 
00120     void reset() {
00121         pos_ = 0;
00122         memset(buffer_, 0, size_);
00123     }
00124 
00129     template<class T> void put(const T* p) {
00130         put(p, sizeof(T));
00131     }
00132 
00138     template<class T> void put(const T* p, unsigned int len) {
00139         if(len > size_ - pos_) {
00140             len = size_ - pos_;
00141         }
00142 
00143         memcpy(buffer_+pos_, p, len);
00144         pos_ += len;
00145     }
00146 
00151     void read(ifstream& ifs) {
00152         if(! ifs)
00153             return;
00154 
00155         ifs.read(buffer_+pos_, size_ - pos_);
00156         pos_ += ifs.gcount();
00157     }
00158 
00159 private:
00161     char* buffer_;
00162 
00164     const unsigned int size_;
00165 
00167     unsigned int pos_;
00168 };
00169 
00170 }

00191 JMA_Dictionary::~JMA_Dictionary()
00192 {
00193     mutex_.lock();
00194     for(ArchiveMap::iterator it=archiveMap_.begin(); it!=archiveMap_.end(); ++it)
00195     {
00196         delete[] it->second.startAddr_;
00197     }
00198     archiveMap_.clear();
00199     mutex_.unlock();
00200 }

00202 bool JMA_Dictionary::open(const char* dirName)
00203 {
00204     assert(dirName);
00205 
00206     string archiveName = createFilePath(dirName, DICT_ARCHIVE_FILE);
00207     string dirPath = normalizeDirPath(dirName);
00208 
00209     mutex_.lock();
00210     ArchiveMap::iterator it = archiveMap_.find(dirPath);
00211     if(it != archiveMap_.end())
00212     {
00213         it->second.refCount_++;
00214         mutex_.unlock();
00215         return true;
00216     }
00217 
00218     DictArchive archive; // reference count is initialized to 1
00219 
00220     // load compressed file into memory
00221     ifstream ifs(archiveName.c_str(), ios::binary);
00222     if(! ifs)
00223     {
00224         cerr << "error: fail to open file " << archiveName << endl;
00225         mutex_.unlock();
00226         return false;
00227     }
00228     // get length of compressed file
00229     ifs.seekg (0, ios::end);
00230     streampos compressBufferSize = ifs.tellg();
00231     ifs.seekg (0, ios::beg);
00232     // at least one block size
00233     if(compressBufferSize < JMA_DICT_BLOCK_SIZE)
00234     {
00235         cerr << "error: dictionary file " << archiveName << " is broken." << endl;
00236         mutex_.unlock();
00237         return false;
00238     }
00239     // allocate memory
00240     MeCab::scoped_array<char> compressBuffer(new char[compressBufferSize]);
00241     if(! compressBuffer.get())
00242     {
00243         cerr << "error: fail to allocate memory in loading file " << archiveName << endl;
00244         mutex_.unlock();
00245         return false;
00246     }
00247     // read file data
00248     ifs.read(compressBuffer.get(), compressBufferSize);
00249     if(ifs.gcount() != compressBufferSize)
00250     {
00251         cerr << "error: fail to load " << compressBufferSize << " bytes from dictionary file " << archiveName << endl;
00252         mutex_.unlock();
00253         return false;
00254     }
00255 
00256     const char* ptr = compressBuffer.get();
00257 
00258     // read total head
00259     unsigned int version, fileCount, totalSize;
00260     MeCab::read_static<unsigned int>(&ptr, version);
00261     if(version != JMA_DICT_VERSION)
00262     {
00263         cerr << "error: dictionary file " << archiveName << " is broken or its version is unsupported." << endl;
00264         mutex_.unlock();
00265         return false;
00266     }
00267     MeCab::read_static<unsigned int>(&ptr, fileCount);
00268     MeCab::read_static<unsigned int>(&ptr, totalSize);
00269     ptr = compressBuffer.get() + JMA_DICT_BLOCK_SIZE;
00270 
00271     // uncompress
00272     MeCab::scoped_array<char> sysDictBuffer(new char[totalSize]);
00273     if(! sysDictBuffer.get())
00274     {
00275         cerr << "error: fail to allcate memory " << totalSize << " bytes to uncompress file " << archiveName << endl;
00276         mutex_.unlock();
00277         return false;
00278     }
00279 
00280     zlib::ZWrapper zwrap;
00281     unsigned int uncompSize = totalSize;
00282     if(! zwrap.uncompress(ptr, compressBuffer.get() + compressBufferSize - ptr, sysDictBuffer.get(), uncompSize))
00283     {
00284         cerr << "error: fail to uncompress file " << archiveName << endl;
00285         mutex_.unlock();
00286         return false;
00287     }
00288     if(uncompSize != totalSize)
00289     {
00290         cerr << "error: uncompress size " << uncompSize << " , while it should be " << totalSize << endl;
00291         mutex_.unlock();
00292         return false;
00293     }
00294 
00295     // read each file head
00296     ptr = sysDictBuffer.get();
00297     const char* content = ptr + JMA_DICT_BLOCK_SIZE * fileCount;
00298     for(unsigned int i=0; i<fileCount; ++i)
00299     {
00300         // file name is the 1st field in head section
00301         const char* head = ptr;
00302         DictUnit& dict = archive.dictMap_[head];
00303         dict.fileName_ = head;
00304 
00305         ptr += JMA_DICT_FILE_NAME_SIZE;
00306         MeCab::read_static<unsigned int>(&ptr, dict.length_);
00307 
00308         dict.text_ = const_cast<char *>(content);
00309 
00310         // round to multiple of block size
00311         content += roundBlockSize(dict.length_);
00312         ptr = head + JMA_DICT_BLOCK_SIZE;
00313     }
00314 
00315     // check end position
00316     if(content != sysDictBuffer.get() + totalSize)
00317     {
00318         cerr << "error: dictionary file " << archiveName << " is broken at end position." << endl;
00319         mutex_.unlock();
00320         return false;
00321     }
00322 
00323     pair<ArchiveMap::iterator, bool> ret = archiveMap_.insert(make_pair(dirPath, archive));
00324     // assign start address only when inserted successfully
00325     if(ret.second)
00326         ret.first->second.startAddr_ = sysDictBuffer.unbind();
00327 
00328     mutex_.unlock();
00329     return ret.second;
00330 }
00331 
00332 bool JMA_Dictionary::close(const char* dirName)
00333 {
00334     assert(dirName);
00335 
00336     bool result = false;
00337     string dirPath = normalizeDirPath(dirName);
00338 
00339     mutex_.lock();
00340     ArchiveMap::iterator it = archiveMap_.find(dirPath);
00341     if(it != archiveMap_.end())
00342     {
00343         it->second.refCount_--;
00344         if(it->second.refCount_ == 0)
00345         {
00346             delete[] it->second.startAddr_;
00347             archiveMap_.erase(it);
00348         }
00349         result = true;
00350     }
00351     mutex_.unlock();
00352 
00353     return result;
00354 }
00355 
00356 const DictUnit* JMA_Dictionary::getDict(const char* fileName) const
00357 {
00358     assert(fileName);
00359 
00360     const DictUnit* result = 0;
00361     string dirStr = getDirPath(fileName);
00362     ArchiveMap::const_iterator archiveIt = archiveMap_.find(dirStr);
00363     if(archiveIt != archiveMap_.end())
00364     {
00365         string fileStr = getFileName(fileName);
00366         DictMap::const_iterator dictIt = archiveIt->second.dictMap_.find(fileStr);
00367         if(dictIt != archiveIt->second.dictMap_.end())
00368             result = &dictIt->second;
00369     }
00370 
00371     return result;
00372 }

00390 bool JMA_Dictionary::compile(const std::vector<std::string>& srcFiles, const char* destFile)
00391 {
00392     assert(destFile);
00393 
00394     if(srcFiles.empty())
00395     {
00396         cerr << "error: no dictionary files to compile into archive." << endl;
00397         return false;
00398     }
00399 
00400     ofstream ofs(destFile, ios::binary);
00401     if(! ofs)
00402     {
00403         cerr << "error: fail to open file " << destFile << endl;
00404         return false;
00405     }
00406 
00407     Buffer buffer(JMA_DICT_BLOCK_SIZE);
00408 
00409     // total head
00410     buffer.put(&JMA_DICT_VERSION);
00411     unsigned int fileCount = srcFiles.size();
00412     buffer.put(&fileCount);
00413     // the uncompressed size of all sections below
00414     unsigned int totalSize = JMA_DICT_BLOCK_SIZE * fileCount;
00415     const streampos totalSizePos = buffer.pos();
00416     ofs.write(buffer.get(), buffer.size());
00417 
00418     // compressor
00419     zlib::ZWrapper zwrap;
00420     if(! zwrap.defalteInit())
00421     {
00422         cerr << "error: fail to initialize compress state." << endl;
00423         return false;
00424     }
00425 
00426     // each file head
00427     for(unsigned int i=0; i<fileCount; ++i)
00428     {
00429         buffer.reset();
00430         string fileName = getFileName(srcFiles[i]);
00431         if(fileName.length() < JMA_DICT_FILE_NAME_SIZE)
00432         {
00433             buffer.put(fileName.c_str(), fileName.length());
00434             buffer.advance(JMA_DICT_FILE_NAME_SIZE - fileName.length());
00435         }
00436         else
00437         {
00438             // terminated with null
00439             buffer.put(fileName.c_str(), JMA_DICT_FILE_NAME_SIZE - 1);
00440         }
00441 
00442         ifstream ifs(srcFiles[i].c_str(), ios::binary | ios::ate);
00443         if(! ifs)
00444         {
00445             cerr << "error: cannot open source file " << srcFiles[i] << endl;
00446             return false;
00447         }
00448         unsigned int fileSize = ifs.tellg();
00449         buffer.put(&fileSize);
00450 
00451         // round to multiple of block size
00452         totalSize += roundBlockSize(fileSize);
00453 
00454         if(! zwrap.deflateToStream(buffer.get(), buffer.size(), ofs, false))
00455         {
00456             cerr << "error: fail to compress into output file " << destFile << endl;
00457             return false;
00458         }
00459     }
00460 
00461     // each file content
00462     for(unsigned int i=0; i<fileCount; ++i)
00463     {
00464         ifstream ifs(srcFiles[i].c_str(), ios::binary);
00465         if(! ifs)
00466         {
00467             cerr << "error: cannot open source file " << srcFiles[i] << endl;
00468             return false;
00469         }
00470 
00471         while(ifs)
00472         {
00473             buffer.reset();
00474             buffer.read(ifs);
00475             bool isFlush = (i == fileCount - 1) && ifs.eof();
00476             if(! zwrap.deflateToStream(buffer.get(), buffer.size(), ofs, isFlush))
00477             {
00478                 cerr << "error: fail to compress into output file " << destFile << endl;
00479                 return false;
00480             }
00481         }
00482     }
00483 
00484     if (! zwrap.deflateEnd())
00485     {
00486         cerr << "error: fail to free compress state." << endl;
00487         return false;
00488     }
00489 
00490     ofs.seekp(totalSizePos);
00491     ofs.write(reinterpret_cast<char *>(&totalSize), sizeof(totalSize));
00492 
00493     ofs.close();
00494     return true;
00495 }

00497 void JMA_Dictionary::debugPrint() const
00498 {
00499     cout << "JMA_Dictionary::debugPrint()" << endl;
00500     cout << "archiveMap_.size(): " << archiveMap_.size() << endl;
00501     for(ArchiveMap::const_iterator it=archiveMap_.begin(); it!=archiveMap_.end(); ++it)
00502     {
00503         cout << it->first << ", ref count: " << it->second.refCount_ << endl;
00504     }
00505     cout << endl;
00506 }

00525 JMA_UserDictionary::~JMA_UserDictionary()
00526 {
00527     mutex_.lock();
00528     for(DictMap::iterator it=userDictMap_.begin(); it!=userDictMap_.end(); ++it)
00529     {
00530         delete[] it->second.text_;

00536 bool JMA_UserDictionary::create(std::string& newName)
00537 {
00538     DictUnit newDict;
00539 
00540     mutex_.lock();
00541     newName = createFileName(USER_DICT_PREFIX, index_++);
00542     newDict.fileName_ = newName;
00543     pair<DictMap::iterator, bool> ret = userDictMap_.insert(make_pair(newName, newDict));
00544     mutex_.unlock();
00545 
00546     return ret.second;
00547 }

00549 bool JMA_UserDictionary::release(const char* fileName)
00550 {
00551     assert(fileName);
00552 
00553     bool result = false;
00554     mutex_.lock();
00555     DictMap::iterator it = userDictMap_.find(fileName);
00556     if(it != userDictMap_.end())
00557     {
00558         delete[] it->second.text_;
00559         userDictMap_.erase(it);
00560         result = true;
00561     }
00562     mutex_.unlock();
00563 
00564     return result;
00565 }

00572     DictMap::const_iterator it = userDictMap_.find(fileName);

00574         result = &it->second;

00579 bool JMA_UserDictionary::copyStrToDict(const std::string& str, const char* fileName)
00580 {
00581     assert(fileName);
00582 
00583     bool result = false;
00584     mutex_.lock();
00585     DictMap::iterator it = userDictMap_.find(fileName);
00586     if(it != userDictMap_.end())
00587     {
00588         DictUnit* dict = &it->second;
00589 
00590         // in case of already allocated
00591         delete[] dict->text_;
00592 
00593         dict->length_ = str.size();
00594         dict->text_ = new char[dict->length_];
00595         if(str.copy(dict->text_, dict->length_) == dict->length_)
00596             result = true;
00597     }
00598     mutex_.unlock();
00599 
00600     return result;
00601 }

00607     for(DictMap::const_iterator it=userDictMap_.begin(); it!=userDictMap_.end(); ++it)
00608     {
00609         cout << it->first << ", ref count must be 1." << endl;
00610     }
00611     cout << endl;
